titles.title: A bill to authorize the purchase of additional lands adjacent to or close to the Bayou Bodcau Wildlife Management Area.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to acquire specified lands adjacent or close to Bayou Bodcau Wildlife Management Area. Provides that such purchased lands shall go toward fulfilling the mitigation obligation of the Chief of Engineers for fish and wildlife losses on the Red River Waterway, Louisiana. Authorizes appropriations.
